div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2107 Sicily, before 1905 (976) Burial: 450-400 B.C. (K) Contents: 6+ AR Catana: tetradr. Disposition: J. Hirsch Nov. 27, 1905, nos. 160-5 Hirsch Cat Nov. 27, 1905, Vorwort Noe supposes that Hirsch's reference to a hd. provenance applies to all the coins of Catana included in the catalogue (nos. 160-9), but more probably only nos. 160-5 are meant
